name: word2com
description: Get words from XLS, create combinations and check related domains

scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.major: npm version major && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.prepatch: npm version prepatch && npm publish --tag next
scripts.preminor: npm version preminor && npm publish --tag next
scripts.premajor: npm version premajor && npm publish --tag next
scripts.prerelease: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag next

author: Anton Nemtsev <thesilentimp@gmail.com>
license: You can't use it if you are not ZloiTip
